definition: abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])
branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Even Fan’s Wikipedia page had already been updated with a line referring to the incident.
sentences.chinese: 甚至連方濱興的維基百科頁面也已經做出了相關更新。

sentences.english: The next day, I looked up Asperger’s syndrome on Wikipedia.
sentences.chinese: 第二天我在維基百科上查了查阿斯伯格綜合症。

sentences.english: The entire English section of Wikipedia, dumped into a machine readable format.
sentences.chinese: 維基百科的全部英文條目，轉儲爲機器可讀的格式。

sentences.english: That’s why Wikipedia is an ideal candidate to set the World Heritage List right.
sentences.chinese: 這就是爲什麼維基百科被題名列入世界遺產之列。
維基百科，我理解，歡迎更正。

sentences.english: This business news tracking service uses Wikipedia to train its recommendation engines.
sentences.chinese: 這種商業新聞跟蹤服務使用維基百科完善其推薦引擎。

sentences.english: An example of quasi-contract can be found in the Wikipedia website .
sentences.chinese: 有關準合約的例子，請參閱維基百科。

sentences.english: Let us know how you use Wikipedia’s knowledge for your own.
sentences.chinese: 然我們瞭解一下你怎樣使用維基百科的知識。

sentences.english: Users can donate here or by clicking on the notice on top of each page on Wikipedia.
sentences.chinese: 用戶可以在此捐款或者點擊維基百科頁面頂端的通告。

sentences.english: You just wrapped up another round of fundraising for Wikipedia.
sentences.chinese: 你剛結束了爲維基百科進行的又一輪募資。
我知道，維基百科歡迎人們修改。

sentences.english: So what will the future Wikipedia be like in a broader sense?
sentences.chinese: 那麼維基百科廣義上的未來又會是怎樣？

sentences.english: The World Heritage List needs Wikipedia.
sentences.chinese: 而世界遺產需要維基百科。

sentences.english: You don’t read an encyclopedia for fun. We’re trying to write a novel.
sentences.chinese: 讀維基百科是找不到樂子的，我們想寫的是小說。

sentences.english: The events are open to participation by anyone and reflect the diversity of the community.
sentences.chinese: 多姿多采的活動，展現了維基百科社羣的多元化。

sentences.english: Wikipedia is increasingly becoming the default reference for the curious.
sentences.chinese: 維基百科越來越成爲古怪事項上人們默認的參考資料。

definition: to translate and edit/translator-editor/(computing) to compile (source code)
vocabulary/list of words (e.g. for language teaching purposes)/word
to abridge (a text)/to edit out (of a movie)/to cut back (a budget, a curriculum)
(Tw) private message/to send a private message
clauses and sub-clauses (in formal document)/entry (in a dictionary, encyclopedia etc)
